channel.title: business-analysis strategy on Jonathan's Portfolio

item.title: Risk Analysis
item.description:
This risk analysis report was created by detailed review of a risk log - sizing/pricing potential impact both before and after identified countermeasures had been applied. Each risk was further categorised and tagged to help improve risk management.

This made project risks clear, actionable, and helped establish a fair basis for any fixed-price negotiations.
